item.title: Data Capture input
item.description: The input of Data Capture is TODO.

item.title: Data Factory input
item.description: The input of Data Factory is the output of Data Capture. From Data Capture output specifications Depersonalised DICOM + EHR data export ├── DICOM │ └── 2016 -- yearly folder, date represents the date of export │ └── 20161029 -- daily folder, date represents the date of export │ └── scan_research_id -- see description below │ └── dicom_name_generated_01.dcm -- set of DICOM files │ └── dicom_name_generated_02.dcm -- set of DICOM files │ └── dicom_name_generated_03.

item.title: Data Capture output
item.description: The Data Capture should export its data into a folder made available to the Data Factory There are several options possible, to adapt to the local requirements: Depersonalised DICOM + EHR data export ├── DICOM │ └── 2016 -- yearly folder, date represents the date of export │ └── 20161029 -- daily folder, date represents the date of export │ └── scan_research_id -- see description below │ └── dicom_name_generated_01.dcm -- set of DICOM files │ └── dicom_name_generated_02.
